doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 超出工单各环节时限情况统计表

sql.name: Tswl_form_sum
sql.item:
select type.类别 as 类别, type.项目1 as 项目, type.项目2 as 项目, type.项目3 as 项目, type.隐藏列 from
(select distinct '网络投诉' as 类别, buss.c801800003 as 项目1, buss.c801800004 as 项目2, buss.c801800005 as 项目3,buss.c801800006 as 隐藏列, buss.c801800007 from {100} buss where buss.c801800001='投诉' and buss.c801800002='网络投诉' order by buss.c801800007 desc,buss.c801800003) type

sql.name: Tswl_form_sum_number
